Ortus Top Menu Theme

= Introduction =

Final design spec's for Ortus Top Menu Theme


= Details =

Main Menu:

Clock is fixed location and always present, also incorporates the screen ICONS. 

Weather adjustable from left to right and can be enabled/disabled, also adjustable in width. 

A group of ICONS should be on the main menu for background import, system messages, currently recording, etc... This can also be adjusted from left to right and enable/disable. Also adjustable in width. 

Text size is adjustable for title and would be the same setting for all screens. 

All Other screens:

Clock is fixed location and always present, also incorporates the screen ICONS. 

Menu items can be adjusted left to right as a group, also adjustable in width. 

Text size is adjustable for title and would be the same setting for all screens.
